4 #include "archives_config.h"

8 #include "shm_array.h"
9 #include <boost/interprocess/offset_ptr.hpp>

11 namespace vistle {
12 
13 template<class T>
14 class shm_array_ref {
15 
16  public:
17  shm_array_ref()
18  //: m_name(Shm::the().createArrayId())
19  : m_name("")
20  //, m_p(shm<T>::construct(m_name)(Shm::the().allocator()))
21  , m_p(nullptr)
22  {
23  ref();
24  }
25 
26  shm_array_ref(const std::string &name, T *p)
27  : m_name(name)
28  , m_p(p)
29  {
30  ref();
31  }
32 
33  shm_array_ref(const shm_array_ref &other)
34  : m_name(other.m_name)
35  , m_p(other.m_p)
36  {
37  if (m_p) {
38  assert(other->refcount() > 0);
39  }
40  ref();
41  }
42 
43  explicit shm_array_ref(const shm_name_t name)
44  : m_name(name)
45  , m_p(name.empty() ? nullptr : shm<T>::find_and_ref(name))
46  {
47  assert(!m_p || refcount() > 0);
48  }
49 
50  explicit shm_array_ref(const std::vector<typename T::value_type> &data);
51  explicit shm_array_ref(const std::vector<typename T::value_type, vistle::default_init_allocator<typename T::value_type>> &data);
52  shm_array_ref(const typename T::value_type *data, size_t size);
53 
54  ~shm_array_ref() {
55  if (m_p) {
56  assert(refcount() > 0);
57  }
58  unref();
59  }
60 
61  void reset() {
62  if (m_p) {
63  assert(refcount() > 0);
64  }
65  unref();
66  m_p = nullptr;
67  m_name = std::string();
68  }
69 
70  template<typename... Args>
71  static shm_array_ref create(const Args&... args) {
72  shm_array_ref result;
73  result.construct(args...);
74  return result;
75  }
76 
77  bool find() {
78  assert(!m_name.empty());
79  if (!m_p) {
80  m_p = shm<T>::find_and_ref(m_name);
81  }
82  if (m_p) {
83  assert(refcount() > 0);
84  }
85  return valid();
86  }
87 
88  template<typename... Args>
89  void construct(const Args&... args)
90  {
91  assert(!valid());
92  unref();
93  if (m_name.empty())
94  m_name = Shm::the().createArrayId();
95  assert(!m_name.empty());
96  m_p = shm<T>::construct(m_name)(args..., Shm::the().allocator());
97  ref();
98  assert(m_p->refcount() == 1);
99  Shm::the().addArray(m_name, &*m_p);
100  }
101 
102  const shm_array_ref &operator=(const shm_array_ref &rhs) {
103  if (&rhs != this) {
104  unref();
105  m_name = rhs.m_name;
106  m_p = rhs.m_p;
107  ref();
108  }
109  return *this;
110  }
111 
112  bool valid() const {
113  return !!m_p;
114  }
115 
116  operator bool() const {
117  return valid();
118  }
119 
120  T &operator*();
121  const T &operator*() const;
122 
123  T *operator->();
124  const T *operator->() const;
125 
126  const shm_name_t &name() const;
127  int refcount() const;
128 
129  void ref() {
130  if (m_p) {
131  assert(!m_name.empty());
132  assert(m_p->refcount() >= 0);
133  m_p->ref();
134  }
135  }
136 
137  void unref() {
138  if (m_p) {
139  assert(!m_name.empty());
140  assert(m_p->refcount() > 0);
141  //std::cerr << "shm_array_ref: giving up reference to " << m_name << ", refcount=" << m_p->refcount() << std::endl;
142  if (m_p->unref() == 0) {
143  shm<typename T::value_type>::destroy_array(m_name, m_p);
144  m_p = nullptr;
145  }
146  }
147  }
148 
149  private:
150  shm_name_t m_name;
151 #ifdef NO_SHMEM
152  T *m_p;
153 #else
154  boost::interprocess::offset_ptr<T> m_p;
155 #endif
156  ARCHIVE_ACCESS_SPLIT
157 
158  template<class Archive>
159  void save(Archive &ar) const;
160  template<class Archive>
161  void load(Archive &ar);
162 };

165 #define V_DECLARE_SHMREF(T) \
166  extern template class V_COREEXPORT shm_array_ref<shm_array<T, typename shm<T>::allocator>>; \
167  extern template void V_COREEXPORT shm_array_ref<shm_array<T, typename shm<T>::allocator>>::load<vistle::yas_iarchive>(vistle::yas_iarchive &ar); \
168  extern template void V_COREEXPORT shm_array_ref<shm_array<T, typename shm<T>::allocator>>::load<vistle::boost_iarchive>(vistle::boost_iarchive &ar); \
169  extern template void V_COREEXPORT shm_array_ref<shm_array<T, typename shm<T>::allocator>>::save<vistle::yas_oarchive>(vistle::yas_oarchive &ar) const; \
170  extern template void V_COREEXPORT shm_array_ref<shm_array<T, typename shm<T>::allocator>>::save<vistle::boost_oarchive>(vistle::boost_oarchive &ar) const;
171 
172 #define V_DEFINE_SHMREF(T) \
173  template class shm_array_ref<shm_array<T, typename shm<T>::allocator>>; \
174  template void shm_array_ref<shm_array<T, typename shm<T>::allocator>>::load<vistle::yas_iarchive>(vistle::yas_iarchive &ar); \
175  template void shm_array_ref<shm_array<T, typename shm<T>::allocator>>::load<vistle::boost_iarchive>(vistle::boost_iarchive &ar); \
176  template void shm_array_ref<shm_array<T, typename shm<T>::allocator>>::save<vistle::yas_oarchive>(vistle::yas_oarchive &ar) const; \
177  template void shm_array_ref<shm_array<T, typename shm<T>::allocator>>::save<vistle::boost_oarchive>(vistle::boost_oarchive &ar) const;
178 
179 V_DECLARE_SHMREF(char) // for MessagePayload
180 V_DECLARE_SHMREF(signed char)
181 V_DECLARE_SHMREF(unsigned char)

183 V_DECLARE_SHMREF(uint32_t)
